title: Bitterman Update, Robyn Crawford, Harris Gynecologist Visit, Pimpin' and more.
itunes:title: Bitterman Update, Robyn Crawford, Harris Gynecologist Visit, Pimpin' and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today we dedicate the show to healing. Inside of J. Anthony Brown's health update, we find out what region of hair he values more. Backside or upper lip? Whitney Houston's best friend Robyn Crawford releases more details of her relationship with the legendary singer. Bitterman has a new book that talks about your kinfolk not being worth a damn. T.I. gets backlash for his parenting choices. Pimpin' shows up to discuss elves, liquor and his week 10 NFL picks. Today in Closing Remarks, Uncle Steve gives us the harsh truth that comes with the territory of being successful, plus much more! Have yourself a great weekend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
